# Denominator

The lower portion of a  fraction; that is  the number below the horizontal bar  of a  fraction. It is used to  calculate,  for example, rates, ratios and  percentages.  In a  rate, the denominator is usually the  population (or population  experience, as  in person-years, etc.) at risk (5).
